name: Green Beans with Bacon & Mushrooms
ingredients: 16 ounce bag frozen whole green beans, thawed

instructions.en: Cook chopped bacon in a large skillet until crisp; set aside
instructions.sk: Opečte nakrájanú slaninu vo veľkej panvici do chrumkava; odložte bokom
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで刻んだベーコンをカリカリに炒め、取り出しておく

instructions.en: Reserve 2 tablespoons of bacon drippings in the pan
instructions.sk: Ponechajte 2 polievkové lyžice slaninového tuku v panvici
instructions.ja: フライパンにベーコンの脂2大さじを残す

instructions.en: Sauté chopped onion in the bacon drippings until tender
instructions.sk: Opražte nakrájanú cibuľu v slaninových výpekoch do mäkka
instructions.ja: ベーコンの脂で刻んだ玉ねぎを柔らかくなるまで炒める

instructions.en: Add drained mushrooms; cook and stir for 2 minutes over medium heat
instructions.sk: Pridajte scedené huby; varte a miešajte 2 minúty na strednom ohni
instructions.ja: 水気を切ったマッシュルームを加え、中火で2分間炒め混ぜる

instructions.en: Stir in thawed green beans, Splenda, and salt to taste (go easy on salt)
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte rozmrazené zelené fazuľky, Splendu a soľ podľa chuti (opatrne so soľou)
instructions.ja: 解凍したインゲン豆、スプレンダ、塩（控えめに）を加えて混ぜる

instructions.en: Cover and cook on low heat for 10 minutes until beans are done, stirring occasionally
instructions.sk: Prikryte a varte na miernom ohni 10 minút, kým fazuľky nezmäknú, občas premiešajte
instructions.ja: 蓋をして弱火で10分間、時々かき混ぜながらインゲン豆が柔らかくなるまで煮る
炒めたベーコンを加えて混ぜる
